explanations.reason: The paper focuses on a clinical study evaluating the efficacy, tolerability, and retention of perampanel (PER) for treating drug-refractory epilepsy (DRE). The study uses retrospective observational methods and regression analyses to assess treatment outcomes. There is no mention of any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models in the title or abstract. The research is purely clinical and does not involve any of the listed machine learning or deep learning keywords.
